headline.main: Protesters in Southwest China Rally to Demand Railroad Link

snippet: The authorities in the southwestern Chinese province of Sichuan said on Monday that plans for a regional rail line were still under discussion after thousands of people protested over reports that the line would bypass their city.
abstract: The authorities in the southwestern Chinese province of Sichuan said on Monday that plans for a regional rail line were still under discussion after thousands of people protested over reports that the line would bypass their city.
